attributes.action: Stop banning dogs especially big dogs
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen because they go out banning breeds of dogs because of a few individuals who can't look after themselves let alone a dog. It has never been a dogs falt it has always been the owners it is time action was taken to hold the owners responsible and not the dogs
attributes.background: I want them to stop banning dogs ,get rid of the banned dogs list and unban dogs. Then start holding the owners responsible instead of a entire breed/ breeds

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509
